title: Only in New York: Bodega owners strike to protest travel ban
text: Debbie Almontaser, president of the Muslim Community Network and an organizer of the event, told Rolling Stone magazine that members of the Yemeni American community had gathered over the weekend to discuss what they could do in response to Trump's ban on travelers from not only Yemen, but also Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan and Syria.
summary: Debbie Almontaser, president of the Muslim Community Network and an organizer of the event, told Rolling Stone magazine that members of the Yemeni American community had gathered over the weekend to discuss what they could do in response to Trump's ban on travelers from not only Yemen, but also Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan and Syria.
